title: Fast, reliable, and hassle-free drug testing
text: For truck drivers seeking fast, reliable, and hassle-free drug testing, Prime Drug Testing is top-notch. They understand the trucking industry's demands and provide quick, accurate results, so you can get back on the road without delays. Their friendly staff is experienced in working with CDL holders, ensuring the process is smooth and compliant with DOT regulations. If you're looking for professional service and peace of mind, Prime Drug Testing is the place to go!
name: Harry Dhillon

title: No wait time, recommend to others
text: Very friendly, and helpful. No wait time, while doing random drug test for my company. Will recommend to others for fast and friendly experience.
name: Omar Rubio

title: Professional, fast, efficient
text: Professional, fast, efficient, friendly and reliable client service and process. The office is clean and easy to find. No wait. I would come here again for the ease of the processes.
